name: Eternal Dreamscape
description:
"Living in a dream should be a happy reality, but what if something you thought that was in your head was keeping you inside?"

WARNING!

THIS IS A DEMO

Contains: Stalking, Dreamlike Imagery, Unsettling Imagery + Noise, Body Horror and Self-Harm.

There is 1 ending currently, I'm planning on adding a gallery a few more endings and just touching up the game along with expanding the story a bit more later on!

I made this within a week so it'll be a bit rough

------------------------------

If you have any questions or find any bugs please do comment below! Feel free give any feedbacks as well!
